verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> <S%H8764><s%>, Altaschith <S%H516><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, Michtam <S%H4387><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, when he fled <S%H1272><s%> <S%H8800><s%> from <S%H6440><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> in the cave <S%H4631><s%>. Be merciful <S%H2603><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto me, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, be merciful <S%H2603><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto me: for my soul <S%H5315><s%> trusteth <S%H2620><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in thee: yea, in the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of thy wings <S%H3671><s%> will I make my refuge <S%H2620><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, until these calamities <S%H1942><s%> be overpast <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
I will cry <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> most high <S%H5945><s%>; unto 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> that performeth <S%H1584><s%> <S%H8802><s%> all things for me.

He shall send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8686><s%> me from the reproach <S%H2778><s%> <S%H8765><s%> of him that would swallow me up <S%H7602><s%> <S%H8802><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>. 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> shall send forth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his mercy <S%H2617><s%> and his truth <S%H571><s%>.

My soul <S%H5315><s%> is among <S%H8432><s%> lions <S%H3833><s%>: and I lie <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8799><s%> even among them that are set on fire <S%H3857><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, even the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>, whose teeth <S%H8127><s%> are spears <S%H2595><s%> and arrows <S%H2671><s%>, and their tongue <S%H3956><s%> a sharp <S%H2299><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%>.
Be thou exalted <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, above the heavens <S%H8064><s%>; let thy glory <S%H3519><s%> be above all the earth <S%H776><s%>.

They have prepared <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8689><s%> a net <S%H7568><s%> for my steps <S%H6471><s%>; my soul <S%H5315><s%> is bowed down <S%H3721><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: they have digged <S%H3738><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a pit <S%H7882><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, into the midst <S%H8432><s%> whereof they are fallen <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8804><s%> themselves. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.

My heart <S%H3820><s%> is fixed <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, my heart <S%H3820><s%> is fixed <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8737><s%>: I will sing <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and give praise <S%H2167><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.

Awake up <S%H5782><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, my glory <S%H3519><s%>; awake <S%H5782><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, psaltery <S%H5035><s%> and harp <S%H3658><s%>: I myself will awake <S%H5782><s%> <S%H8686><s%> early <S%H7837><s%>.
I will praise <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee, O YY <S%H136><s%>, among the people <S%H5971><s%>: I will sing <S%H2167><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto thee among the nations <S%H3816><s%>.
For thy mercy <S%H2617><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> unto the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and thy truth <S%H571><s%> unto the clouds <S%H7834><s%>.
Be thou exalted <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, above the heavens <S%H8064><s%>: let thy glory <S%H3519><s%> be above all the earth <S%H776><s%>.
